name: Bauble Hunter
description:
Calling all Bauble Hunters! Explore the ancient alien crystal and unlock new paths at the end of each one in this endeavor to uncover strange and new treasure!

You are part of an elite group of spacefaring treasure hunters set out to uncover secrets of the crystal tower. Explore and collect treasure to get closer to an answer about the mysteries and collect amazing baubles and other treasures along the way!
